mapper.select: select rownum, a.userid, a.username, a.gender, trunc((to_number(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY'))-to_number(to_char(a.birth, 'YYYY'))+1),-1) birth, a.tourcnt, a.heart, a.report, to_char(b.endday, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from regist a full outer join suspend b on a.userid = b.userid order by rownum desc
